Author: CoinKing88#1540
Content: @hyperDEX can you elaborate some more on the mid july update for the hyperdex/barterdex? Will it be a first mm2 version or production ready and what are the improvements over mm1?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content:
@CoinKing88 the focus right now is to get atomicdex working (basically the mobile app), so work on web sockets (way our app communicates with the back end) has not started. Without that we cannot provide updates to the GUI.

The biggest changes is that mm2.0 was built in rust so memory leakage issues were solved and that trades are completing nearly 100% of the time whereas the old mm 1.0 there were issues.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So overall a big UX win.
